title: Pancakes
meta: Mix makes three batches, stores up to 3 months.

directions.text: To make mix; combine flour, sugar, baking power, baking soda, and salt in a container and shake.
Whisk egg whites, vanilla extract and buttermilk together in a small bowl.
Whisk egg yolks with melted butter.
Pour all liquids rendered on top of 2 cups of mix, and whisk together.
Keeping a griddle buttered cook at a tad below medium heat, flipping once one side has standing bubbles.
Freeze leftovers by sandwiching them between towels for a couple hours then transfer to a freezer bag
